text: What I don't like is breakfast in the morning. I have a double-espresso cappuccino, but no food.
author: Wolfgang Puck

text: It is always with excitement that I wake up in the morning wondering what my intuition will toss up to me, like gifts from the sea. I work with it and rely on it. It's my partner.
author: Jonas Salk

text: I never want to make a film. I don't wake up in the morning going, 'Ooh, I'd really love to be on set making a film today'. I'm aware that other contemporary film directors perceive film-making as what they do, as what they have to do. But I would hope that I am more catholic in my tastes.
author: Stephen Daldry

text: I am, in fact, Superman. Every morning I wake up and go into a telephone booth and change my costume, and then go to work.
author: Stephen Daldry

text: I was up late last night yapping about the elections on CNN and up early this morning doing the same thing in my daughter's kindergarten class.
author: Tucker Carlson
